article: A boy was sent by his parents to a boarding school . Before being sent away, this boy was the  _  student in his class. He was at the top in every competition. But the boy changed after  _  home and attending the boarding school. His grades started dropping. He  _  being in a group. He was lonely all the time because he felt no one loved him. His  _  started worrying about the boy. But they did not know  _  was wrong with him. So his dad  _  to travel to the boarding school and  _  with him. They sat on the bank of the lake near the school. The father started  _  him casual questions about his classes, teachers and sports.  _  some time his dad said, "Do you know, son, why I am here today?" The boy answered back, "To check my  _  ?" "No, no," his dad replied, "I am here to tell you that you are the most important person for  _  . I want to see you  _  . I don't care about grades. I care about you. I care about your happiness. YOU ARE MY LIFE." These words caused the boy's eyes to fill with tears. He hugged his dad. They didn't say  _  to each other for a long time. Now the boy had everything he wanted. He knew there was someone on this earth who cared for him  _  . And today this young man is in college at the  _  of his class and no one has ever seen him sad!
